name: Speeding Bullet To Heaven
description:
Made for Spacespy Jam #3.

Contains Strong Language, Sexual References; Unsuitable for younger audiences.

How To Play:

Use mouse to move left and right.

Left-click to shoot bullets.

Like Dante's Inferno, but with guns.

You play as Domenica Mane, a woman who has just died but has been rejected from heaven. She is sent to the 9th circle of hell, where she finds a revolver. She decides to fight her way to heaven.

Shoot your way through the 9 circles of hell and enter heaven by force!

Development and art by FennecFu. Music by Crispin Joseph.
